text: Hey Kristian, HS does have a bug bounty program, I’d submit your issue here: <https://bugcrowd.com/HubSpot>

Hi everyone,

We are currently trying to work with Account Extension API for currency.
The main objective we are trying to achieve is to update the Currency Conversion rate using an API.
We have found one (SS attached here)
Has anyone used this before?
Any  help would be appreciated

Hi <#C2YHAHB6K|api>,
Quick Webhook question: how to do Webhook signing with Private Apps? Can't find an app ID.

Also, are there any ways to customise the data sent by the Webhook? At the moment, I am getting a 20kB blob to parse on each call, when really I need a couple of bytes :slightly_smiling_face:

Thanks
